mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) as num from writeBoard
mapper.insert: insert into writeBoard (board_num, board_type, board_title, board_content, board_createDate) values (#{board_num}, #{board_type}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_createDate})
mapper.select: select board_num, board_type, board_title, board_content, board_createDate from writeBoard where board_num = #{board_num}
